lines.gurmukhi: puin kq pMc qq mylu Kylu hoie kYsy BRmq Anyk join kutMb sMjog hY
lines.transliteration_english: Pouni Kat Panch Tat Maylu Khaylu Hoi Kaisay , Bhramat Anayk Joni Koutanb Sanjog Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: After wandering in many species of life, I have been able to get a chance of living a family life as a human being. When will I get this body of five elements again?

lines.gurmukhi: puin kq mwns jnMm inrmolk huie diRsit sbd suriq rs ks Bog hY
lines.transliteration_english: Pouni Kat Maanas Jananm Niramolak Hui , Drisati Sabad Surati Ras Kas Bhog Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: When will I get this invaluable birth as human being again? A birth when I shall be able to enjoy the relishments of sight, taste, hearing etc.

lines.gurmukhi: puin kq swDsMgu crn srin gur igAwn iDAwn ismrn pRym mDu pRjog hY
lines.transliteration_english: Pouni Kat Saadhasangu Charan Sarani Gur , Giaan Dhiaan Simaran Praym Madhu Prajog Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: This is an opportunity of uniting into the knowledge, contemplation, meditation and enjoying the loving elixir-like Naam that the True Guru has blessed me with.

lines.gurmukhi: sPlu jnmu gurmuK suKPl cwK jIvn mukiq hoie log mY Alog hY ]243]
lines.transliteration_english: Sadhalu Janamu Gurmoukh Soukhaphal Chaakha , Jeevan Moukati Hoi Log Mai Alog Hai ?243?

Shabad OS B.translation: An obedient Sikh of the True Guru endeavours to make this birth a success by living his worldly life and yet remaining aloof. He relishes and repeatedly drink deep the elixir-like Naam that the True Guru has blessed him with and thus he becomes emancipate
